Articles.Content:
I got to the mun..

i was going to fast and couldn\'t slow myself down so for some reason i flew across the mun for a while...

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky
He\'s usually the Welcoming Committee for new posters.

LOL Spambot.

I can assure you I am not a bot. As a moderator of the forum, I like to give everyone a semi-official welcome. It helps foster a good community and shows that we are here and alive.

I use the same greeting in a macro because it becomes a bit tedious typing that out 100 times a week. If warranted, I will add some additional text, but it\'s usually not needed.

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

Shhh... the bot will kill us in our sleep...

the bot is programmed to raise Skunkie\'s post coun-ARRG HELP ME!
